--- title: Data Representation keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module is dedicated to represent software artifacts into proper abstract structure such as vectors or graphs. Possible subfolders:" ---

class Vectorizor[source]

Vectorizor(vectorizor) :: ABC

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

class BertVectorizor[source]

BertVectorizor(vectorizor) :: Vectorizor

Vectorization subclass that handles vectorizing using BERT

path = Path('/tf/data/models/JavaBert-v1')

vectorizor = BertVectorizor(pipeline(
    "feature-extraction",
    model= str(path),
    tokenizer= str(path)
))
